A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as avid of a star wars fan as I'm sure a lot of people on this site are. With that said\, I've watched the movies\, and this is by far the worst one. Even some of the previous movies that weren't as good\, at least had a back story or at least some decent story telling. This movie was so all over the place I thought it was bad...I can't imagine how some of the more die hards feel about it.
